job_description:
Company: MobilePro
Position: Mobile Developer
Location: Los Angeles, CA (Hybrid)
Salary: $115,000 - $165,000

About Us:
MobilePro is dedicated to creating innovative and engaging mobile applications. We thrive on delivering exceptional user experiences on mobile devices.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Mobile Developer to join our team. The perfect candidate will have experience developing applications for iOS and/or Android platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms.
- Collaborate with designers to implement user interfaces.
- Write clean, maintainable code.
- Participate in code reviews and testing.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 2+ years of experience in mobile app development.
- Proficiency in Swift/Kotlin or React Native/Flutter.
- Experience with mobile UI/UX best practices.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with cross-platform mobile development.
- Knowledge of mobile app testing frameworks.
- Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for mobile apps.

Benefits:
- Competitive pay and benefits.
- Opportunity to work on exciting mobile projects.
- Collaborative and innovative work environment.
